mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN h.count > 0 OR m.count > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS result FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM tbl_host WHERE host_email = #{email}) h CROSS JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM tbl_member WHERE member_email = #{email}) m
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(member_id, member_email, member_pwd, member_nickname) values(SEQ_MEMBER.nextval, #{email}, #{pwd}, #{nickname})
